name: variableseeder
description: The Variable Seeder extension equips your Azure DevOps pipeline at runtime with the variable values for the given environment.
author: white duck GmbH

inputs.name: jsonFilePath
inputs.label: Build variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the values.json which should be populated in the build variables

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment which key/value pairs should be populated in the build variables
